data.title: This is where to go for pizza
data.text: The pizza here is as good as any you will find in Kansas City. It has a thinner crust and they put on lots of toppings. The place is packed on weekends and you usually have to wait for a table. Side salads come with iceberg lettuce, topped with mozzerella cheese, fake bacon bits a single slice of pepperoni and their secret dressing- they are delicious!

data.title: Friendly Service. Good Food.
data.text: Many people in the area cite this as their very favorite pizza place. I think the pizza is good but it probably rates as third on my list. It is a nice place to eat in pizza with an old pizza shop feel that is lacking in most places as they are carry out only. They do have gluten free crust and a variety of other foods.

data.title: A tradition
data.text: So glad that back in the day when Old Shawnee Pizza emerged after being a pizza shoppe they would maintain the taste and quality we had all grown accustomed to.  with the addition of the full service bar, things are only better.  They are a little pricey so make sure and go on line and get yourself a coupon before you go.  Make sure you have a salad to - you will not be disappointed.

data.title: Always a hit!
data.text: Love the pizza here among other items. They really load it up with toppings!  The thin crust is great. Be sure to get a salad with their signature dressing

data.title: Great place!!
data.text: OSP Shawnee is a great place to relax, enjoy some pizza and a brew! The staff is very accommodating and the pizza is excellent.

data.title: Great pizza...great atmosphere!
data.text: One of our favorite local restaurants.  The pizza is always good, and the atmosphere is inviting.  Be sure to try the salad with their "green" dressing!

data.title: Classic Local Pizza, always quality
data.text: I've been going here since I was a kid. Nothing beats the light flaky crust they have, and their "secret-ingredient" salad dressing. The service is always fast, and they have good deals!

data.title: KC favorite
data.text:
I love this place. Every time we order, we have it delivered-it's quick and friendly. The online ordering is really easy. 

We have ordered several pizzas from here but the all meat one is the best and the toasted ravioli is great.

data.title: Great Eats, Laid Back Atmosphere
data.text: I've been to Shawnee Pizza several times now and every time, the beer is cold, the staff are friendly and the pizza is amazing. Of all the pizza places out there, OSP has the BEST crust: crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, even in the center. It's a great place to watch a game or have a nice family dinner that won't break the bank. It's tucked out of the way just north of Shawnee Mission Parkway on Nieman Road, but OSP is definitely one not to miss.

data.title: the pizza place with a western name
data.text: First off, this is a great place to eat crisp delicious crust pizza! all the ingredients are great.the staff is great too. there are lot's of good things on the menu to choose from besides the pizza. personal I love the spinach salad and the Carne Italiano pizza, but you can't go wrong at this place. there is a little bar downstairs that has a good selection of beer for those of us who like a good craft beer.

data.title: Awesome Pizza!
data.text: Best pizza place in town. The pizza has a balance of cheese to meat to sauce ratio. The salad dressing is out of this world! I must to visit.

data.title: CONSISTENTLY GOOD
data.text:
OLD SHAWNEE PIZZA is a very solid neighborhood pizza joint . They offer a diverse menu for your typical pizza place. Good reasonable prices on food and drink .  I cannot say it is an authentic Italian Pizzeria  but it is a nice neighborhood restaurant that has served Shawnee families for many years . Has hosted many ball team parties and community events over the years. The ownership is local and is always on hand for fundraisers. They are good people . They provide  good  food ,  good service, ,   and always very consistent .
THUMBS UP 
Longtime Customer

data.title: Fantastic pizza
data.text: Old Shawnee Pizza has fantastic pizza and a very friendly atmosphere. Besides pizza they also have other delicious menu items. A must try is their salad with their house dressing.

data.title: Pretty good pizza, not too great calzone
data.text: Great atmosphere, courteous waitress, and pretty decent service. I had a calzone, which wasn't the best, but I've known their pizza to be pretty good. A little pricy for a smaller calzone serving, though.

data.title: Mr.
data.text: Service was fast but the food was average at best. The pizza sauce was bland and scarce. Not a bad choice for a quick eat and go if quality isn't your top priority.

data.title: Great selection of pies!
data.text: We had quite a crowd to please at the end of thanksgiving week.  We tried the double cheeseburger, meat locker, caprese, and a couple of other meat pies.  All were fantastic and pleased all diners, regardless of age. Also great to support a local business!!

data.title: Good pizza
data.text: We've eaten here for over 35 years. The pizza is consistently good. The sales salad is good and the dressing is legendary.

data.title: Love the cracker crust!
data.text: I've gone to this Pizza place since high school and it still has the same great cracker thin crust and great sauce.  We still love it!

data.title: Umm, sandwiches!
data.text: Old Shawnee Pizza's French Dip sandwich is a delight. Tender, lean and meaty with great bread. So far, everything I have tasted there is great. Enjoy the coupons and offers they text to me.

data.title: Shawnee' s first  pizza place
data.text: Excellent pizza as well as sandwiches and salads.  Must try their famous salad dressing, very creamy, thick and delicious.  Been in Shawnee since I've lived here which was 1981.
